markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skeleton Key](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3030)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 276 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A grinning skull tops the bow of this macabre key. This key can be used in place of a thieves' toolkit when attempting to [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=70), and it grants a +1 item bonus to the Thievery check. If the skeleton key becomes broken due to a critical failure on the check, it works as a normal thieves' toolkit and loses its benefits until repaired. 

**Activate—Loosen Lock** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The key casts [_breach_](/Spells.aspx?ID=168) on the lock you're trying to pick.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Skeleton Key
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 276 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Skeleton Key (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 276 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The key grants a +2 item bonus, and you can activate the key once per hour.
name: Skeleton Key
